programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: You're All Useless!
programme.desc: Negu is sick and tired of Amkko, Koto and Mei’s uselessness and kicks them out. The Guardians try to teach them to behave properly so they can fit in in the Yan World, but the Mutants are the worst students ever. Negu sends them a message saying that if they snatch the Glove of the North, he’ll take them back, so Mei tricks the Guardians into taking them to the Magic Fort and tries to steal the glove. Everyone is relieved that the Mutants are back to normal.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: LOTTERY
programme.desc: Chai Raja buys a lottery ticket from a ticket seller who passes by. Chai Raja dreams of him in a 7 storeyed teashop, with many Sundars cleaning and serving around. Getting out of his dream, Chai Raja writes down the number on the wall and hands the ticket to Sundar. Sundar, caught up in his chores tucks it away in his tent but forgets about it. Next day Sundar look at the newspaper and is stunned to see that the ticket has won the prize!Sundar searches high and low inside his paraphernalia, watched by Basha till he finally finds it in his tent. Sundar lapses into a day-dream in which he owns the 7 storeyed teashop with Chai Raja at his service and Basha cleaning around. However, Basha pokes his tail popping the dream and dashes off with the ticket. A mad chase, ensues as Sundar tries to get back the ticket. Basha wants the ticket for himself so that his own dream may come true that of being the owner of the 7 storeyed teashop with bananas all around and Chai Raja, his personal chef. (Sundar will be the entertainment). The chase starts now for the ticket. Chai Raja has no clue as to what is happening. As the chase happens, the greedy customers want to get their hands on it as well. The ticket finally falls and there is a pile-up outside the shop as everyone dives for it. Sundar emerges, dishevelled and bruised but holding the ticket- only to have it chewed by a nanny goat! By then Chai Raja arrives at the scene realizing what just happened.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: MeetZonicornEne
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornValeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: KALAI-TEA-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is organizing a Kathakali performance in front of his teashop for a group of special guests in the evening. The Kathakali dancer is in the shop enjoying tea and snacks. In the crazy fight between Sundar and Basha, the dancers both legs gets bandaged and he runs away from the shop. Chai Raja catches Sundar in the act! Chai Raja is so angry and panicking. He decides that Sundar is going to dance Kathakali! Next we see a poor Sundar all dressed up in the Kathakali costume with his snout sticking out. The performance starts and Sundar doesnt know what to do. The naughty Basha still has no plans to leave poor Sundaralone. He tries to trips, tickle, push and irritate Sundar from the rafter of the stage. Sundar is running all over the stage musch to Bashas delight and Chai Rajas horror. But the special guests love Sundars performance and awards him with a trophy! Basha is stunnedand Sundar is thrilled beyond words!

programme.title: Hula Hoop
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: ALLY-GATOR
programme.desc: Once a spooky-looking biologist comes to the teashop to have tea. He opens a box and starts doing some things into it (arranging eggs, or feathers or studying specimens). He is also having his tea. Once he finishes the drink, the old man leaves. But Sundar notices a thing fall from his box. By the time Sundar runs to the door, the man is gone. The thing looks like a shiny stone. Sundar is about to add the stone to his box of trinkets when Basha swoops in and snatches the box away. Sundar chases after Basha and they collide and the box flies open and the shiny stone falls out. Much to Sundars wonder (as well as Basha who sneaks up), the stone starts to crack. It is actually an egg. It cracks open and out pops a mischievous little alligator who gets a giggle out of messingg with the customers. The baby-alligator is literally after Sundar calling him Mama. A thunderous Chai Raja orders Sundar to get his alligator under control- which is made even more impossible thanks to Bashas meddling. But the twist happens when the baby-dragon starts calling Basha Papa! The shop looks straight out of a disastrous war movie when much to Sundars and Bashas relief, the absent minded biologist turns up and in a trice, tames the naughty alligator. But all doesnt end well as Sundars single sigh of relief is all that it takes to bring down the teetering shop to a pile of wood and leaves!

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: MeetZoonicornAliel
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: TEA-THING TRAUMA
programme.desc: Chai Rajas old aunt, a lady who is pencil thin and frail as a willow turns up for a visit. Sundar believes she is a sweet toothless granny, the wallpaper kind- but what he or Basha for that matter dont anticipate is the granny to have a voracious appetite. The granny gobbles up just about anything in sight and the trays barely make it out of the kitchen to the customers. Sundar almost catches her red-handed and when questioned by Chai Raja for the missing snacks blames her- in return he gets a sound thwack on his head as a furious Chai Raja points at his granny who beams wide- she is toothless! How can she eat without teeth! Demands Chai Raja. Sundar too is perplexed and so is Basha who too is annoyed to find his normal share of fritters missing. Basha and he team up to corner the artful granny. They soon discover that she has a hidden pair of dentures that she uses conveniently to chew down the chow. With Bashas help, Sundar manages to snatch away the dentures and the shop erupts in chaos as the granny proves that she too has quite a killer aim with plates! She retrieves the dentures and is about to chomp down in triumph when Chai Raja happens on her. But all the sweet-natured Chai Raja does is pack some extra fritters for her as she bids him a goodbye while an exasperated Sundar chases Basha from again raiding the shelves.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Hokus croakus!
programme.desc: The twins make peace between a witch and a young girl whos been messing with her book of spells.

programme.title: Paper Plate
programme.desc: Simple yet the possibilities are endless, Hepi and Briko surprise us with their ideas

programme.title: Prima donna
programme.desc: The twins help a girl become a movie star, but she becomes a primadonna.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Things change!
programme.desc: Yo and Yo meet Tim, who is sad because his cuckoo clock has retired and has been replaced by a cute young alarm clock.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Too Many Bubbles
programme.desc: When Pancake eats too many bubbles from the Bubble Pond, he becomes super bouncy. Too much of anything isnt good.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: How To Meet a Spoon
programme.desc: Odessa is scared of meeting new people when she goes off to camp, so the Zoonicorns use a flashback to remind her that she knows how to make new friends – and that its fun! When you’re afraid of trying something new, you can practice until it is not scary anymore.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: XIA’S BAD DREAM
programme.desc: Xia becomes over-confident after he pulls off an impossible move invented by the Elders. But in his dreams, he keeps losing to mutants! April and Xia have to go into his nightmare and give him advice to conquer his dream enemies.

programme.title: Plot for Teacher
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: BRUSH WITH DANGER
programme.desc: The Guardians can’t believe the Elders are giving them art lessons – HARD art lessons, with lots of criticism! But all the lessons in brushwork pay off when the Guardians apply their new skills to wielding their weapons as they battle a big color-blasting mutant snail sent by….you guessed it!

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: Like A Bridge Over Troubled Teeter Totters
programme.desc: Pancake helps the Zoonicorns “imagine” a bridge across the Sticky-Icky River, but it comes out completely wrong, and he must learn not to give up and that just because something ended up a bit different than planned that it still can’t do the job. Don’t give up if something doesn’t go exactly as planned; keep trying and be creative.

programme.title: The Librarian
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: Wait For Me, Star
programme.desc: After a disappointing day of fishing, the forest friends look at the twinkling stars that have risen in the night. Dada tells them that if you wish on a shooting star, then your wish will come true. Before going to bed, Duda and Scot see a shooting star. But the star falls before they can make their wish. So they separately decide to go look for the fallen star, and end up meeting in the forest. While searching together, they discover some fireflies and mistakenly think they are stars. In a mad race to catch one of them, they end up falling on a cliff ledge. But before they have time to get scared, they notice a shooting star, and finally get to make a wish. Eventually, Dada comes to their rescue, and Duda and Scot return home safely. What do you think Duda and Scot wanted? Do you think his wishes came true?

programme.title: Samir and the Sky Lamp
programme.desc: Samir plans to launch a lantern into the sky and measure how far it rises but his experiment is cut short by the Grand Vizier. Mild mannered Samir does not argue with authority and obeys the Grand Viziers orders but Jamillah and Aladdin see the injustice of the situation and convince Samir that he should go ahead with his experiment. Unfortunately taking their advice gets Samir arrested. Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie fly Samirs lamp for him and Samir, spurred on by Jamillah and Aladdins example states his case to the Sultan. Samir is delighted when his bravery is rewarded and the Sultan releases him, it turns out the Sultan is also a man of science and is delighted with Samirs experiment, much to the Grand Viziers annoyance.

programme.title: The Golden Key_Based On Hansel & Gretel
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Hansel and Gretel”, called by the WITCH. The magic key to her larder, in which she is holding HANSEL and GRETEL prisoner, has disappeared. SANDRA will have to find the key and deceive the WITCH, in order to be able to help the little brother and sister escape

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Short Report
programme.desc: Everyone is reading a popular blog gossiping about people at school. When the blog post Brains pictures of aliens, she risks having her secret identity exposed.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Poder De La flor
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: Love Deodorant
programme.desc: With the school’s formal dance coming up, Fred insists Friday should be able to do something to find him a love potion so Nora will be attracted to him. Brains catches Friday trying to keep up the charade.

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Hi Five
programme.desc: Pancake splits off four copies of himself, which makes trying to catch them five times more difficult! And he’s having trouble counting that high. Always keep trying/resilience to failure.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Asuntos de familia
programme.desc: Lara es una abogada que no pierde ningún caso, pero en su vida personal, no tiene tanto éxito.

programme.desc: Lara es una abogada que no pierde ningún caso, pero en su vida personal, no tiene tanto éxito.

Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Hustle Hits
